div.div: Kalladi College, Mannarkkad is the proud symbol of the Muslim Educational Society, Calicut to the cause of higher education in Kerala, especially to the educationally backward areas of Malabar. This is the first college started by the and it is also the felicitous outcome of the nobleii endeavor of the late Kalladi Cheriya Kunhammed Sahib and the local public. College is located in a vast area, a major part of which was donated by the late Janab...

div.div: Kalladi College is one of the most prestigious institutions in the Palakkad District. It is an honour to lead as the principal of this esteemed institution as it surpasses all the glories in ac ademics, arts and sports. The institution serves as a promise to the society by providing quality education by reinforcing social commitment. The excellence the college renders through the education is an asset to the young generation. It caters...

div.p: Three teams of our college being selected as the winners of the preliminary contest of the YIP 6.0 Idea Hackathon

MES provided an opportunity to discover my true potential. Mentoring and counseling had paved way for that. It prepared me for the unforeseen future and the harsh realities of outside world. At the same time it is a second home for me and I am glad to be a part of MES family.
